reviews.review:
One of the best FPS games of all time. Playing since cs 1.6
Although the anti-cheat system is not that great and you can find a lot if hackers these days which spoils the game.

cooldown system is this broken. I live in the area with frequent power cuts and due to this I suffer weekly cooldown like everytime. Can you please decrease the limit of cooldown to maybe 1-2 days like faceit does
So many cheater dog in the game... VAC is nothing VALVE is dont do anything. This game now is sh@t....
its a little hard starting out cause at lvl 7 and higher you can get to play with high level players but since its free its a really good game recommend since u dont need a powerful pc to run it
This game is like Crack Cocaine
you are a liar if you are not addicted with this game
fun game but community is toxic af
kozak gra dla rage'y dla zniszczenia m√≥zgu i siebie polecam
top ... jogo fps hard level ou voce sabe ou nao sabe jogar !!!
jogo muito bom , indico para muitas pessoas jogarem ! O unico problema √© que muitas pessoas usam xiter ' : (
playing it, since it got released, still is awesome, hope they come out with more better ways to enjoy this game forever and ever...
i can let my penis code for two hours and create a better server system than this piece of shit game.
Csgo is a good and no Toxic Game i love the Game Physiks and all other is is the best game in the World.
el juego es lo mas, pero los servidores oficiales de 64tick y la gente llena de cheat es asqueroso
Jogo muito bom, viciante e emocionante. Bom para fazer amigos tbm.
Comunidad muy toxica, muy monotono, muchos chiteros, los servers se caen cada dos por tres. Recomendadisimo juego
This was the first game I got when I switched to pc and ive really enjoyed it
This is the only game i play on steam lol xD

i have played this game ever since high school and there has not been another game to fulfill my soul like this one.. the rush i get when i play this game gives me mad goosebumps then i start boppin people on the head!! i've been searching years to find another game to top this. even my girlfriend cannot fulfill the number one in my heart. (if you didn't know cs-go is #1) this game gives you life and you also die a little inside everytime you don't one shot someone.. i hope that whoever plays this game will find that enlightenment and feel care-free in these difficult times.
A very fun game and nice community (though it can be a bit much sometimes), still better than team fortress 2 community though.
JOGO DE QUALIDADE PODE COMPRAR O PRIME
